title: Who was Noor Inayat Khan? - Quora

response.answer_text: A brave lady of Indian descent of the brave Tipu Sultan.An intelligence (SOE) radio operative during WW II, worked in France. Her trainers initially weren't confident of her capabilities. But she turned out to be very succesful intelligence agent. She was captured by Germans when betrayed by another FrenchmanNever revealed any information to her captors till the end. She was considered by the Germans as a dangerous captive.Tried to escape her captors many times. She was tortured and finally killed.

She was an Indian origin girl born to a Muslim father and a Mexican mother. Her father was an illustrious Sufi musician and a descendant of Tipu Sultan. She took part in the Second World War as the first ever woman radio operator under the alias Nora Baker. Unfortunately she was discovered by the Germans and executed.
